description: We aim for heart monitoring device requiring minimal patient input and backed by Artificial Intelligence to assist in diagnosis and monitoring patients. It is a patch that will be placed in the chest with multiple sensors talking to each other over BLE to form a conventional EKG electrode placement.

title: Pharmacy Hardware Development
description: We are developing pharmacy hardware solutions that will help patients and providers. Some of the projects include smart pill box and retail pharmacy drug inventory indicator
